articles.title: Brendan Fraser speaks about his son Griffin, 20, having autism and obesity - Daily Mail
articles.description: The actor, 53, shares three sons - Griffin, 20, Holand, 18, and Leland, 16 - with his ex-wife Afton Smith, who he divorced in 2007 after nine years of marriage.
